name: Organic Cotton Bandana Bib - Blue Honeycomb on White
description:
Super cute bandana-style bib made from 100% organic cotton. The bandana is the perfect accessory for any little outfit, and not only looks adorable but will happily catch all that runaway dribble. One snap button fastening. Hand screen printed and handmade in Melbourne.

FABRIC
100% Organic Cotton 

PRINT
Honeycomb

COLOURWAY
Blue on White

SIZING 
ONE SIZE (3 - 24 months)

SHIPPING
Within Australia: 
We are now charging a flat rate of $8.50 for orders within Australia. However as our knits are bulkier and heavier than our cotton garments, they will be charged at $3.50 extra to cover the cost of a large satchel. 

Express:
If you require Express Post, we also offer an Express Post satchel for guaranteed next day delivery for $9.55. 

Pick Up:
We are more than happy for you to come to our studio in Brunswick, Melbourne to collect or buy from us direct. BY APPOINTMENT ONLY. Please contact us if you wish to stop by.

International customers:
We use REGISTERED POST INTERNATIONAL or PACK & TRACK where available. Therefor it is a flat rate for shipping to international customers, which allows up to 500g per package. We are obviously happy to send as many items in the one package as required, up to the 500g limit. If you have a query about any international shipping charges, please don't hesitate to contact us.

If you would prefer to PAY LESS for UNREGISTERED mail, please contact us prior or immediately after your purchase and we will adjust/refund the difference in postage. We cannot take any responsibility for items that are lost in transit if they are not registered.

GIFT WRAPPING
Please advise us if the purchase is a gift, we will happily gift wrap your item for no extra charge.
